thread.title: Police seeking man wanted for questioning in multiple Brockton rape cases - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Police seeking man wanted for questioning in multiple Brockton rape cases - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Police seeking man wanted for questioning in multiple Brockton rape cases - Massachusetts news
text:
Massachusetts State Police and Brockton police are seeking information about a man wanted for questioning in connection with multiple rapes that occurred in Brockton, according to the Plymouth County District Attorney’s Office.
Authorities said the man is in his 20s and is about 6 feet tall and around 180 pounds. Witnesses have seen him driving a dark blue or black sports car in downtown Brockton, but he may have ties to Easton as well, according to the DA’s office.
The rape incidents originated or occurred in Brockton from 2013-2014, authorities said.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Anyone with information is encouraged to call the Brockton Police Detective Division at 508-941-0234.
